Re: %s Fwd: %s Session expired Your session has expired, please log in to CTemplar again. Email Next Next (No Email) Password Username 2 FACTOR AUTHENTICATION Enter code generated by the app. Captcha CTEMPLAR Forgot password We will send a reset link to your recovery email. Choose password Confirm password CTemplar username to reset Recovery email Security check Recovery email (Optional) Reset password Reset code Confirm Confirm Reset Password Invitation code If you have further questions please email support@ctemplar.com Your encryption key is connected to your password. Because of this you will not be able to decrypt old messages, attachments and contacts if you reset your password. Are you sure you want to reset your password? We have sent a reset code to your recovery email to reset your password. Enter it below for confirmation. Don\'t forget this password, it can\'t be restored. Forgot your username? Keep me logged in Forgot your username? Enter your email address and we will send you your username. Email me my username Username and domain This will be your new CTemplar email address. Your password must be at least 10 characters. Password can contain only Latin letters and cannot contain symbols such as «-+!@. etc. By checking this box you understand that if you lose your password and do not set a recovery email, your account will not be recoverable. Your password is connected to your encryption key, if you change your password you will be issued a new encryption key and ALL contents of your account will be lost except for your email address. Less By checking this box you understand that if you lose your password and do not set a recovery email your account will not be recoverable. More info This is used to recover your account if you forget your password. Please check this box if you agree to abide by our Terms and Conditions. You can get invitation code from any existing paid customer or you can request an invitation code from us. Why invite codes and how to get one? Learn more More Info You have no inbox messages You have no %1$s messages You have no contacts yet You have no folders There are no messages match the filter Log in Compose Add folder Write text from image / Time display in clock (hh:mm) e.g.: 04:23 Forgot Password? Yes No Settings Display name Type your name Type your signature Signature enabled PIN Lock Enable PIN Lock Change PIN Auto-Lock Enter a 4-digit PIN Confirm your PIN Invalid PIN Please try again in %d second(s) PINs do not match B I U M Normal Subscription My Subscription Upgrade Upgrade for %s Packages Sending limits Attachments limit Storage Aliases Custom domains Folders %s/day %d MB %d GB Unlimited Features Encryption in transit Encryption at rest Encrypted attachments Encrypted subject Encrypted body Virus protection 2FA security Anti-phishing phrase Brute-force proof Zero-knowledge privacy Anonymized IP Self-destructing emails Dead-man timer Delayed delivery Catch-all domains Remote encrypted link Exclusive beta access Not available on Android Plans Billing Billing Cycle End Recurring Billing Payment Subscription upgraded successfully Failed to upgrade subscription. Please try again later To upgrade the subscription, use the device on which it was issued Proxy (beta) Use Tor Use Tor for network requests. Requires Orbot HTTP Proxy Use HTTP Proxy for network requests Proxy Host Proxy\'s address (e.g. 127.0.0.1) Proxy Port Proxy\'s port number (e.g. 8118) To activate the proxy, you must fill host and port fields Failed to initialize proxy Enter the correct IP address Enter the correct port Proxy enabled Note. The attachments downloading feature uses the Android download manager which does not support proxies for now. It will be replaced with our own download manager. Stay tuned for the next update. General settings Recovery email Enable recovery email Type your recovery email Type your notification email Enter a notification email on which you would like to receive notification each day when you have new emails. Anti-Phishing Type your anti-phishing phrase Subject encryption Password Language Notifications Enable push notifications Contacts encryption Keep decrypted subjects locally Encryption Phishing Protection The Anti-Phishing phrase allows users to link a custom word or phrase of your choice to your CTemplar account. Once set, if you ever log into your webmail and your Anti-Phishing phrase is either missing or incorrect, you may be the victim of phishing. You should immediately confirm that you are visiting https://mail.ctemplar.com If you are not, then a malicious site might have your login credentials for your CTemplar account. To prevent harm to your account, you should immediately visit https://mail.ctemplar.com and change your password.

Note that the Anti-Phishing phrase will be displayed when you log on web only. AutoSave Automatically save contacts Automatically save drafts Filters Whitelist/Blacklist Dark mode Block external images Report bugs Folders Manage folders Security Mail Addresses Signature Enable signature Type your signature Keys About Helpdesk Local storage limit App version Are you sure you want to disable contacts encryption? Disabling contacts encryption can take several minutes depending upon the number of contacts you have. After you confirm, all your contacts will be decrypted on your device and saved on the server. Primary key will always be placed in the top of the key list. Are you sure you want to continue? Private key Public key Please enter your account password to continue Please type CTEMPLAR to confirm. Generate keys Are you sure to import the private key? After deleted this key, you will not be able to decrypt any message that was encrypted with this key.
